value: Magic toy boat. While on this boat, you can't drown if the boat is completely dry. ~20cm long
Reroll with d8
Reroll with d10
Reroll with d12
Reroll with 1d12, but ignore result and give an autobiography of a horse anyway.
Magic glasses. While wearing this, you perceive every creature as looking like you
Invisible ink marker. The ink can only be made visible with the use of a Wish spell. Good for 1d20 words.
A cell phone
A recipe for https://www.fantasynamegenerators.com/food-names.php
The autobiography of a horse named https://appzaza.com/random-interjection-generator
Mitts that give +1 hand warmth, but are too awkward and big to hold anything
A waterproof towel. Takes 2 carrying capacity
A cursed ring: wearing this ring, you believe your other ring is cursed
Belt. While it is in your possession, you are always at Exhaustion level 5.
A helmet that vibrates whenever you take damage, to let you know you took damage.
Boots that, while worn, make you think everyone's speed is 30ft.
A cloak that gives really bad advice while you wear it
A piece of lead
A toaster
Magical blindfolds: you are blind while wearing these blindfolds
